item.title: C & C++ link order
item.description: If any [static] library A depends on symbols defined in library B, then library A should appear first in the list supplied to the linker. +- prog.o -----+ +- libA.a -----+ +- libB.a -----+ | U funcA --|---|-> T funcA | | | U : undefined/used | | | U funcB --|---|-> T funcB | T : defined | T main | | | | | +--------------+ +--------------+ +--------------+ gcc prog.
